about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a haunting experience where every level is a mystery to be unraveled.

 You're trapped in a dark, twisted dream where endless hallways and desolate rooms will make you question every step you take. The oppressive atmosphere and eerie sounds will keep you on edge as you figure out how to escape each level.

In this game inspired by the classic backrooms, every door is a challenge, every room a threat. The feeling that something is following you is constant, and the only way to survive is to stay calm and move forward, but beware... you won’t always know where you're heading.

Can you uncover the hidden dynamics of these levels before it's too late?

 This demo gives you a first glimpse of the terror to come in 2024. Get ready to lose yourself in the unknown, solve misteries, and confront your deepest fears.

content_descriptors.notes: There is psychological terror and darkness, including jumpscares.

name: The Stare Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10- 64bit
  • Processor: Intel core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650/AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Los requisitos pueden cambiar en futuras actualizaciones

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Temas sensíveis
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Step into a nightmare where every level hides a deadly secret. Trapped in a twisted maze of endless corridors and eerie rooms, every door you open could be your last, and every step could lead you deeper into danger. Can you stay calm, solve the mysteries, and find a way out ?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
